HIPPLUG-825
Make sure the query for facnav nodes get an encoded basepath
Upgraded for Hippo CMS 7.9. Incompatible with 7.8 or lower.

HIPPLUG-547
The Implementation-Build manifest entry has been added in order to keep projects using the plug-in from issuing a warning about the absence thereof.

HIPPLUG-546
The robots.txt resource for preview sites now disallows everything by default. Again, check the Robotstxt component for information on how to override this behavior.

HIPPLUG-567
The disallow faceted navigation URL mechanism is now enabled by default, and the UI does, by default, not show the check box anymore. The behavior can be overridden through the console. Check the Robotstxt component and bean for more info.

HIPPLUG-577
The installation and configuration of the plug-in has been simplified by using an embedded Freemarker rendering script. Configuration is now limited to adding the sitemap item. As the page configuration is bootstrapped into the hst:default configuration, the sitemap item cannot be configured through the Channel Manager, but you have to use the Console.

HIPPLUG-544
Bump hst artifact version to 7.8.

HIPPLUG-571
Cleanup and refresh LICENSE and NOTICE files.

subsection.p: In order to correctly update the plugin-specific definitions in the repository, this version of the plugin requires a Hippo CMS project based on Release 7.6 or later.

ul.li: Support for automatically disallowing faceted navigation links.
Rendering moved from bean to JSP.

subsection.p: During CMS initialization, the Robots.txt configuration document type is automatically extended to support the new disallow faceted navigation flag. You can then adjust this setting on a per-document basis in the CMS, if so desired.
